title: Radio Good Omens - Episode 2 Animatic
author: fishfingersandscarves
comment: This is a sassy Aziraphale. I love him.
Between the book, the show and the radio drama, Radio!Aziraphale is the biggest bastard of them all, and I love him for it
If the entire radio adaptation is like this, listening to it has suddenly become more of a thing I need to do.
Oh my god this is great!! I LOVE radio omens, there’s not a ton of fan-content for it around. You are doing the lord’s work here, thank you!
description:
Just something fun to fill up the time!

These are my book designs bc I love these idiot homocelestials

Good Omens belongs to Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman

Radio Good Omens belongs to the BBC

don't sue me thanks
